testcase.classname: F01_register | Users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: Guest user could registration with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User go to register page..............................................passed And User select gender type.................................................passed And User enter first name and last name.....................................passed And User enter date of birth................................................passed And User enter email........................................................passed And User fill password fields...............................................passed Then User click register....................................................passed And Validate that registration is successes.................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_SignIn | Users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed And user login with valid email and password................................passed Then user press on login button.............................................passed And verify signIn successes.................................................passed
